entries.title: How to password protect a PDF document
entries.description: A quick drag-and-drop is all it takes to password-protect your PDFs.

entries.title: These are the biggest smartwatch fails and flops of 2022
entries.description: It was a good year for smartwatches, but there are plenty of decisions worth revisiting.

entries.title: Irrational or not, I still long for a screenless Fitbit
entries.description: Is anyone interested in a Fitbit Flex 3? Please let Fitbit know.

entries.title: The biggest smartphone fails of 2022
entries.description: From poor software decisions to canceled phones and more, these were the year's biggest fails.

entries.title: Oppo now promises to match Samsung for updates (or does it?)
entries.description: The company is promising four major Color OS updates, but that isn't necessarily the same as an Android version update.

entries.title: We asked, you told us: Chrome OS has plenty of regular users
entries.description: Just over half of all surveyed readers say they use Chrome OS all the time.

entries.title: First Google Pixel 8 camera leak points to major upgrade
entries.description: It sounds like the Pixel 8 series could gain staggered HDR tech, which requires a new camera sensor.

entries.title: More evidence emerges about the Pixel Tablet Pro
entries.description: Is this the fully-equipped Pixel Tablet we haven't seen yet?
